about.title: about
description: I'm a BSc Computer Science student at Nottingham Trent University, with a passion for game development and creating innovative and meaningful digital experiences.

contacts.title: contacts
contacts.text: I am interested in freelnace oppurtunities or working in goal oreintated companies. However, if you have any other requests or questions, don‚Äôt hesitate to contact me

description: I'm a BSc Computer Science student at Nottingham Trent University, with a passion for game development and creating innovative and meaningful digital experiences.

I've developed games using Python, JavaScript and C++. I am a freelance game developer and have also assisted clients with debugging and solving troubles with their code. I am familiar with front-end development, proficient in CSS, HTML and JavaScript, using frameworks such as Node, React and Next JS.

Additionally, I have tutored young learners in Mathematics and mentored people from disadvantaged backgrounds to start their careers in the tech industry. These experiences have helped me grow as a developer, communicator and collaborator, using technology to create a meaningful difference.

Outside of tech, I enjoy cheerleading and tennis. I'm a member for my university teams which keeps me disciplined, creative and team oriented. I also enjoy painting, I find that creativity in art and design often overlaps with the creativity I bring into coding and games.

Right now, I'm developing my skills as a programmer, designing games and digital art, expanding my tech toolkit, gaining certifications, work experience and working on my personal and collaborative projects. I am also looking to build my network and connect with like-minded people I can learn from and grow with.
Reach out, share ideas. Let's both learn something new!
